body.name: Monoprice Commercial Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket Extra Wide for 43" to 90" TVs up to 154lbs, Max VESA 800x400, Fits Curved Screens
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 42 mins
features: Low Profile Tilting TV Wall Mount: Designed for TVs that need to be mounted above eye level, the tilt functionality in Monoprice tilting TV wall mounts allow you to adjust the screen angle to eliminate glare and to provide a better viewing angle.
Designed For Flat and Curved Displays: This mount is designed for 43" ~ 90" flat and curved displays.

Heavy Duty Steel Construction: This Monoprice wall mount bracket is constructed from high quality, cold rolled steel, which makes it capable of supporting displays weighing up to 154 pounds. It can be easily mounted to brick, concrete, or wood stud walls.
Supports VESA patterns between 200x200 and 800x400. Supports TVs weighing up to 154 pounds.
Minimalist design with solid holding power.
body.description: Specifically designed for large screen TVs, this Low Profile Extra Wide Tilting TV Wall Mount Bracket features a minimalist design with solid holding power. By giving you the ability to adjust the vertical angle of the TV, the tilt mechanism easily compensates for a TV positioned above the optimal viewing level. The ability to adjust the angle of your display can not only reduce glare, it also lets you tilt the TV up for making easier cable connections. It is designed for curved or flat screen TVs from 43" ~ 90" weighing up to 154 pounds, with VESA mounting patterns from 200x200 to 800x400.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RECOMMENDED TOOLS The following tools are highly recommended for making the installation of your wall mount as safe and straightforward as possible. Some installation instructions may call for specific types or sizes of these tools. Phillips screwdriver Steel drill bit Level Stud finder Allen wrench Power drill Monoprice Low‑Profile Extra Wide Tilting TV Wall Mount Bracket - Commercial Series For 43" to 90" flat and curved TVs weighing up to 154 pounds Designed for large screen TVs, this Low‑Profile Extra Wide Tilting TV Wall Mount Bracket features a minimalist design with solid holding power. By giving you the ability to adjust the vertical angle of the TV, the tilt mechanism easily compensates for a TV positioned above the optimal viewing level. The ability to adjust the angle of your display can not only reduce glare, it also lets you tilt the TV up for making easier cable connections. Designed for curved or flat screen TVs from 43" ~ 90". VESA compatible from 200x200 to 800x400 Designed for 43" to 90" displays Tilts +3 ~ ‑12 degrees 154 pounds weight capacity Low‑profile design mounts the TV only 1.9" from the wall Designed to work with both flat and curved displays

LOW‑PROFILE TILTING TV WALL MOUNT Designed for TVs that need to be mounted above eye level, the tilt functionality in Monoprice tilting TV wall mounts allow you to adjust the screen angle to eliminate glare and to provide a better viewing angle. "IS THIS MOUNT COMPATIBLE WITH MY TV?" Check your TV's manual for its VESA mounting pattern or measure the horizontal and vertical distances between the mounting holes (in mm). This mount supports VESA patterns between 200x200 and 800x400. This mount supports TVs weighing up to 154 pounds. The screen size range is only a suggested approximation. Your TV is compatible as long as its VESA mounting pattern is between 200x200 and 800x400 and it weighs no more than 154 pounds. HEAVY‑DUTY STEEL CONSTRUCTION This Monoprice wall mount bracket is constructed from high quality, cold‑rolled steel, which makes it capable of supporting displays weighing up to 154 pounds. It can be easily mounted to brick, concrete, or wood stud walls.
DESIGNED FOR FLAT AND CURVED DISPLAYS This mount is designed for 43" ~ 90" flat and curved displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Some reviews make me shake my head. This wall mount was very simple to install, and the absolute best value. In fact the price concerned me, but the quality is great. I needed an extra long mount and this mount spans 35 inches. It’s simple to install, and has a very close profile to wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Important tip when installing
reviews.reviewText: I don't normally write reviews but am doing so to save anyone buying this from time and frustration trying to set and lock the tilt. Didn't come with any instructions but I found the instructions and a short instructional video online (Monoprice website). Both were visual only, with no instructional text (the sheet) or words (the video), and neither explain how to use the tilt-setting finger bolts. It's next to impossible to tighten them after hanging the TV due to lack of clearance behind the TV. Same for plugging things in. My tip: tighten the tilt-adjustment bolts to lock the desired tilt (very tightly) before you hang the TV, bring the TV close to where you will hang it so you are close enough to the peripheral devices to plug in their respective cables into the back of the TV, then hang it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Find a better product
reviews.reviewText: The split design rather than a single piece is not the best but price was reasonable and it does its job although you will have a hard time leveling. Also the tilt will not hold but only to the most inclined position as design does not considers the weight of the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buy any other bracket besides this one
reviews.reviewText: Didn't notice the hinged sides on the bracket that allows it to be packed and shipped in a smaller box. This is not a good bracket, weak, wobbly, difficult to mount the TV straight. This has to be the worst bracket I've ever seen. Not sure how this got high ratings from other buyers. When the bracket is not one piece, it's not a good bracket. I would have sent it back but once I got the bracket mounted to the wall, I didn't want to take the chance of tearing out the anchors to remove it and replace it with something else. It does the job, but just barely in my opinion. I'd recommend buying literally any other bracket besides this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a tight fit. Really! I like the end result in our case because we wanted the TV tight to the wall.But, once this is on the wall, there’s no chance of reaching anything behind to plug in, adjust, or anything else.The two release cords are pretty ugly dangling down below the TV. And with how tight things are, it’s really hard to engineer a way to tuck them out of sight and yet keep them accessible for use when needed.I’ve been a big fan of Monoprice for nearly 15 years. A bit disappointed that this seems to lack the thoughtfulness of their other products.

Had to mount an older 50” plasma. It has mounting points further apart than modern LED/OLED TVs, so I had to order this mount for its specific width.Mount is easy to assemble and sturdy. All the hardware was included.
